ResearchProjectDef.label: basic deepblue refining
ResearchProjectDef.description: Research production of basic deepblue compounds.

ResearchProjectDef.label: advanced deepblue refining
ResearchProjectDef.description: Research production of advanced deepblue compounds.

ResearchProjectDef.label: deepblue sysnthesis
ResearchProjectDef.description: Research means of synthesysing complex deepblue compound.

ResearchProjectDef.label: improved pneumatic pump
ResearchProjectDef.description: Research for more efficient both powerful pneumatic pump.

ResearchProjectDef.label: laminar theory
ResearchProjectDef.description: Research ways to produce laminar field. A directional field of energy that can be used as a virtual rail that guide matters through it.

ResearchProjectDef.label: laminar field manipulation
ResearchProjectDef.description: Research ways to manipulate lamianr field. This will allow more flexible use of the technology.

ResearchProjectDef.label: abysstech foundry
ResearchProjectDef.description: Replicate abysstech's ways of production. Especially production of their valuable alloy, abyssteel.
ResearchProjectDef.discoveredLetterText:
Now you have access to the powerful abysstech of The lighthouse. You need some abyssteel to kickstart the whole process, here are some ways to get it:

-All Moyo settlements are most likely to sell abyssteel.
-Melt down things made from abyssteel(weapons, armor and abysstech mechs).
-Some quests are rewarded with abyssteel.

ResearchProjectDef.label: repurposed diving shell
ResearchProjectDef.description: Craft abysstech diving shells. Used as a substitute for armor in the civil war, it went through many modifications to be adapted for surface use, including removal of the tail piece.
